title: Potted Lava Plants
summaries: Potted Lava Plants are placeable furniture items. They have 50*1/2 (50%) chance of being dropped when opening an Obsidian Crate or Hellstone Crate.

They give off a considerable amount of light but do not count as <linked>light sources</linked> for <linked>NPC</linked> <linked>housing</linked>. They cannot be switched on or off using <linked>wiring</linked>.

statistics.Sell: 60 SC
